question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. traffic light
B. statue
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The traffic light is in the foreground, clearly visible and positioned near the viewer, while the statue is in the distant background, making the depth relationship very obvious.
